message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,200,000. It's a valuable piece, and I'm sure you'll find it highly beneficial. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $900,000 is simply too low. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $900,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $950,000?

Bob, I'm getting the feeling we're not going to see eye-to-eye on this. I'm going to stick to my last offer of $1,050,000. If you're not willing to come up to that, I might need to look at other options.
I understand you're trying to get your price, but I'm still a bit below $1,000,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $980,000?

Bob, we've been going back and forth for a while now. I'm really hoping we can come to an agreement.  I'm willing to come down to $1,020,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. I'm not sure how much lower I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1,020,000, but I'm still a bit above $980,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $990,000?
